name: Fight Corona (Toaster33)
description:
In this game you play as a vaccine-snake on a giant corona virus trying to destroy it. The concept is like the classical snake game, but everything is in 3d. You have to collect food on the surface of the virus to get bigger. But beware of the large corona-spurs, because they will kill you.

To move the snake just use "a" and "d" or the arrow keys of your keyboard.

Have fun playing and you will destroy the pandemic!
